member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Gettext.Catalog.Count
member.value: The number of strings/translations in the catalog.

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Gettext.Catalog.Item(System.Int32)
member.value: Gets n-th item in the catalog (read-write access).

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Gettext.Catalog.PluralFormsCount
member.value: Returns plural forms count: taken from Plural-Forms header if present, 0 otherwise
